Views¶

1. Lettings application views¶

lettings/views.py

contains the Django view’s functions related to lettings models

lettings.views.index(request)[source]¶

Index page for lettings

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – the HttpRequest Object

Returns:

HTML page for lettings index page

Return type:

HttpResponse

lettings.views.letting(request, letting_id)[source]¶

Page for letting whose id is letting_id

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – the HttpRequest Object

  • letting_id (int) – letting’s id

Returns:

HTML page for letting page 404.html page in case of unknown id

Return type:

HttpResponse

2. Profiles application views¶

profiles/views.py

contains the Django view’s functions related to profiles models

profiles.views.index(request)[source]¶

Profiles index

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – the HttpRequest Object

Returns:

HTML page for profile’s index page

Return type:

HttpResponse

profiles.views.profile(request, username)[source]¶

User’s Profile

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – the HttpRequest Object

  • username (str) – profile’s username

Returns:

HTML page for user’s profile page 404.html page in case of unknown id

Return type:

HttpResponse
